help-file.title: ENSLAVER
help-file.content:
When the Psionicist chooses this path, they regress into the ways of their Illithid captors, and use their willpower to subjugate lesser races to do their bidding. It is also rumored that they can use their powers to further pry into their victim's mind, causing some nasty side effects.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- none!
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 41st level: improved psychic crush
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 6th circle: awe 12th circle: spinal corruption
